timeline.message:
Consider temporary limits of end2 when directly linked to terminal2

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Consider temporary limits of end2 when directly linked to terminal2

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure it’s an « if » not an « else if »?
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText: No, it is possible to have both non null adders when the CGMES OperationalLimitSet is linked to the equipment (not a terminal). In this case, if we want to be logical, the limits must be on both sides.
replies.author: miovd
